player1.name: Rahul Kumar
player1.pitch: State-level chess player with experience in organizing tournaments. Also play football as striker. Known for strategic gameplay and quick decision making.

player2.name: Priya Singh
player2.pitch: Professional badminton player with district-level achievements. Also enjoy carrom and chess. Strong in both singles and doubles formats.

player3.name: Alex D'Souza
player3.pitch: The Mafia game master! Also skilled in table tennis and volleyball. Great at team coordination and strategy games.

player4.name: Meera Patel
player4.pitch: College basketball team captain. Expert in organizing sports events. Also play badminton and carrom.

player5.name: Arjun Reddy
player5.pitch: Cricket all-rounder and chess enthusiast. Won multiple tournaments in both sports. Good at mentoring new players.

player6.name: Sarah Khan
player6.pitch: Professional volleyball player and team strategist. Also enjoy basketball and table tennis. Experienced in organizing large tournaments.

player7.name: Dev Sharma
player7.pitch: Football goalkeeper with state-level experience. Also play cricket and chess. Known for quick reflexes and strategic thinking.

player8.name: Zara Ahmed
player8.pitch: Table tennis champion with 5 years of tournament experience. Also skilled in badminton and carrom. Great at both singles and doubles.
